post_text: January 9, 2017 at 1:05 AM#1Hey at All,I want to change the shape in the Fx. But I do not know how to do it.I've already tried it with:________________________assign effect 1 /form=4________________________assign effect 1 /form=Pwm________________________assign effect 1 form Pwm________________________Unfortunately nothing has worked.Can you help me?Lg Lightmean

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: January 9, 2017 at 4:40 AM#2Forms are a separate, assignable object. Assign Form x At Effect y (or ... At Effect 1.y.z)

title: How can I assign a Form to an Fx with a macro
